TYVM! Will seed now. Got it all working. 

To all people having trouble:

Get daemontools
Select 2 drives
Look for the "fake directory" (called MOHAA normally)
Copy the exe from the "crack" file in the downloaded MOHAA section. Install.

When it asks for 2nd CD just browse and find the CD2 iso.


After patching, you need to crack it again, just copy the exe into the proper file and overwrite.
